group_1.textLeft: It's almost time for the shutters to rise...

group_1.textRight: Oh, I'm starting to feel a little nervous...!
By the way, you got in line early, so you're@pretty much at the front.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, but...@The line starts over there.

group_1.textRight: What?!@Seriously?!
I wonder how long those people have been@waiting...

group_1.textLeft: Since the first train, of course...

group_1.textRight: The first train!
I'm afraid I wouldn't be able to get up@that early...
If it were me, I'd probably just stay up@and stand in line the night before!

group_1.textLeft: S-Seira...!@That's...overnighters are...
Something a decent human being must never do!

group_1.textRight: A decent human being...?!

group_1.textLeft: Overnighters increase the cost of security.
That cost will then become a burden on@the participants...

group_1.textRight: I-I see.
But still...@That's a lot of people over there...
I wonder how many visitors there are...?

group_1.textLeft: It's not "visitor", it's "participant".

group_1.textRight: Uh, participant...

group_1.textLeft: Also, I've heard that about 70,000 people@come each day...

group_1.textRight: 70,000 people! Wow, the doujin industry is amazing!

group_1.textLeft: I heard bigger events can go up to@200,000 people.

group_1.textRight: ...Then this thick, expensive catalog sells@just as many copies...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's right...
Thick catalogs are like a tradition for@these events.

group_1.textRight: I guess this is another kind of souvenir.

group_1.textLeft: By the way... In my head I call that catalog:
"Hecatoncheires' Revelation"

group_1.textRight: Wow...
But Rui, you really know a lot about Kamiket.
How long have you been participating?

group_1.textLeft: The first time I participated was in my first year@of middle school...
When I learned the creator of a free game I loved@was going to release a new one at Kamiket...

group_1.textRight: You're here today for the new one in that series,@right?
Hmm...@I see, I see...

group_1.textLeft: It's the "[textRed:Bible of The End]" series.
It's by a circle called "X for Knight"...
The creator, Mr. MacQueen, is "God"...
Although, I got infected with chuunibyou because of@his work.

group_1.narration: In other words, Mr. MacQueen is both God...@and...the Devil who turns life into Hell...@Indeed, God and the Devil are the same being...!@※Mr. MacQueen is incredible, but I can't recommend him.

group_1.textCenter: I don't want to disturb you...@I'll just check a review site.

group_1.narration: Bible of the End series@Average score: 8 out of 100
3 points: @Bit too “chuuni” for me to keep up with...@I think Miranda’s much better.@But hey, at least the characters are cute!

100 points:@This series goes beyond the concept of a game.@It's a civilization unto itself that unfolds before your eyes@into the true purpose of life: that which mankind@has sought from the dawn of time, the real@meaning of existence.@It's clear that it's beyond the comprehension of unbaptized@fools and...

group_1.textCenter: Hey, Earth to Rui!@Come back to us!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Ahh!
...R-right, let's go...
